polychemprint3.tools.toolSpec module¶

The toolSpec Abstract Base Class specifies the interface for all Tool objects (extruders/lasers/etc)

First created on Sun Oct 20 00:03:21 2019
Revised: 20/10/2019 00:34:27
Author: Bijal Patel
class polychemprint3.tools.toolSpec.toolSpec(name, **kwargs)¶

Bases: polychemprint3.utility.loggerSpec.loggerSpec, abc.ABC

abstract disengage()¶

Deactivates tool (stops dispense/LASER off, etc) | Parameters | none

Returns
[1, “Tool Disengaged”]
[-1, “Error: Tool could not be disengaged”]
abstract engage()¶

Activate tool (dispense/LASER on, etc) | Parameters | none

Returns
[1, “Tool Engaged”]
[-1, “Error: Tool could not be engaged”]
abstract getState()¶

Returns active state of tool | Parameters | none

Returns
[1, “Tool On”]
[0, “Tool Off”]
[-1, “Error: Tool activation state cannot be determined + Error]
abstract loadLogSelf(jsonString)¶

loads json log back into dict

Parameters
jsonString, json string to be loaded back in
Returns
none
abstract setValue(value)¶

Set Tool value of a specified Tool parameter | Parameters | value - the new value of the parameter

Returns
[1, “Value Set succesfully”]
[-1, “Error: Parameter could not be set for Tool + error text”]
abstract writeLogSelf()¶

Generates json string containing dict to be written to log file

Parameters
none
Returns
logJson, log in json string format
